languages.text: "Может быть, ты предотвратила гибель Эклендиля, идущего Путем Провидца, одного из ведущих Крударах провидцев, что был пленен в Темном городе мастером плоти вместе с остальными нашими собратьями? Да. Мне известна {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylDiedInSpire}его судьба{/d}".

traits.locale_text: "Может быть ты предотвратила гибель Эклендиля, идущего Путем Провидца, одного и ведущих Крударах, что был пленен в Темном Городе мастером плоти вместе с остальными нашими собратьями? Да. Мне известна его судьба".
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "Did you prevent the death of Eklendyl, follower of the Path of the Seer, one of the Crudarach Farseers tormented by the master of flesh in the Dark City along with the rest of our kin? Yes, I am aware of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylDiedInSpire}his fate{/d}."
languages.original_text: "Может быть, ты предотвратила гибель Эклендиля, идущего Путем Провидца, одного из ведущих Крударах провидцев, что был пленен в Темном городе мастером плоти вместе с остальными нашими собратьями? Да. Мне известна {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylDiedInSpire}его судьба{/d}".

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps you prevented the death of Eklendyl who had been following the Path of the Seer, one of the Crudarach timoneers tormented by the flesh sculptor alongside the rest of our kin? Yes, I am aware of his fate."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps you prevented the death of Eklendyl who had been following the Path of the Seer, one of the Crudarach timoneers tormented by the flesh sculptor alongside the rest of our kin? Yes, I am aware of his fate."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

traits.locale_text: "Did you prevent the death of Eklendyl, follower of the Path of the Seer, one of the Crudarach Farseers tormented by the master of flesh in the Dark City along with the rest of our kin? Yes, I am aware of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylDiedInSpire}his fate{/d}."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

traits.locale_text: "Did you prevent the death of Eklendyl, follower of the Path of the Seer, one of the Crudarach Farseers tormented by the master of flesh in the Dark City along with the rest of our kin? Yes, I am aware of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylDiedInSpire}his fate{/d}."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: «¿Quizá evitaste la muerte de Eklendyl, que recorría la Senda del Vidente, uno de los timoneles de Crudarach que fueron torturados por el maestro de la carne de la Ciudad Siniestra junto con el resto de nuestra gente? Sí, estoy al tanto de {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylDiedInSpire}su destino{/d}».
languages.original_text: "Did you prevent the death of Eklendyl, follower of the Path of the Seer, one of the Crudarach Farseers tormented by the master of flesh in the Dark City along with the rest of our kin? Yes, I am aware of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylDiedInSpire}his fate{/d}."

traits.locale_text: «¿Quizá evitaste la muerte de Eklendyl, que recorría la Senda del Vidente, uno de los timoneles de Crudarach que fueron torturados por el maestro de la carne junto con el resto de nuestra gente? Sí, estoy al tanto de su destino».
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: “埃克伦迪先知，克鲁达拉赫的领导者，和我们的其他族人一起被困在黑暗之城，遭受血肉大师的折磨。莫非你当初救过他一命吗？是啊，他的{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylDiedInSpire}命运{/d}我很清楚。”
languages.original_text: "Did you prevent the death of Eklendyl, follower of the Path of the Seer, one of the Crudarach Farseers tormented by the master of flesh in the Dark City along with the rest of our kin? Yes, I am aware of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylDiedInSpire}his fate{/d}."

traits.locale_text: “埃克伦迪先知，克鲁达拉赫的领导者，和我们的其他族人一起遭受血伶人的折磨。莫非你当初救过他一命吗？是啊，他的命运我很清楚。”
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: « Avez-vous empêché la mort d'Eklendyl, qui suivait la Voie du Prophète ? Ce Grand Prophète de Crudarach torturé par le sculpteur de chair dans la Cité Crépusculaire avec d'autres de nos semblables ? Oui, je suis au courant {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylDiedInSpire}de ce qui lui est arrivé{/d}. »
languages.original_text: "Did you prevent the death of Eklendyl, follower of the Path of the Seer, one of the Crudarach Farseers tormented by the master of flesh in the Dark City along with the rest of our kin? Yes, I am aware of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylDiedInSpire}his fate{/d}."

traits.locale_text: « Avez-vous empêché la mort d'Eklendyl, qui suivait la Voie du Prophète ? Ce timonier de Crudarach qui s'est fait torturer par le sculpteur de chair avec d'autres de nos semblables ? Oui, je suis au courant de ce qui lui est arrivé. »
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: 「おそらく、お前は先見司の道をあるいていたエクレンディルの死を防いだのだろう。彼は、仄暗き都で屍肉の主によって苦しめられていたクルダラのティモニアの1人だ。ああ、彼の{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylDiedInSpire}運命{/d}は知っている」
languages.original_text: "Did you prevent the death of Eklendyl, follower of the Path of the Seer, one of the Crudarach Farseers tormented by the master of flesh in the Dark City along with the rest of our kin? Yes, I am aware of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylDiedInSpire}his fate{/d}."

traits.locale_text: 「おそらく、お前は先見司の道をあるいていたエクレンディルの死を防いだのだろう。彼は、仄暗き都で屍肉の主によって苦しめられていたクルダラのティモニアの1人だ。ああ、彼の{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylDiedInSpire}運命{/d}は知っている」
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "Habt Ihr den Tod von Eklendyl verhindert, der dem Pfad des Sehers gefolgt ist, der einer der Runenpropheten von Crudarach war und gemeinsam mit dem Rest unserer Verwandten vom Meister des Fleisches gefoltert wurde? Ja, ich weiß von {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylDiedInSpire}seinem Schicksal{/d}."
languages.original_text: "Did you prevent the death of Eklendyl, follower of the Path of the Seer, one of the Crudarach Farseers tormented by the master of flesh in the Dark City along with the rest of our kin? Yes, I am aware of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylDiedInSpire}his fate{/d}."

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht habt Ihr den Tod von Eklendyl verhindert, der dem Pfad des Sehers gefolgt ist? Er war einer der Rudersmänner von Crudarach, der gemeinsam mit dem Rest unserer Verwandten vom Fleischbildhauer gefoltert wurde. Ja, ich weiß von seinem Schicksal."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "Et üstadının Kara Şehir'de soydaşlarımızın geri kalanıyla birlikte işkence ettiği Crudarach Ötesezeni, Medyumun Yolu'nda yürüyen Eklendyl'in ölümünü engelleyebildin mi? Evet, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylDiedInSpire}onun akıbetinden{/d} haberdarım."
languages.original_text: "Did you prevent the death of Eklendyl, follower of the Path of the Seer, one of the Crudarach Farseers tormented by the master of flesh in the Dark City along with the rest of our kin? Yes, I am aware of {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylDiedInSpire}his fate{/d}."

traits.locale_text: "Et üstadının Kara Şehir'de soydaşlarımızın geri kalanıyla birlikte işkence ettiği Crudarach Ötesezeni, Medyumun Yolundan yürüyen Eklendyl'in ölümünü engelleyebildin mi? Evet, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_EklendylDiedInSpire}onun akıbetinden{/d} haberdarım."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader
